name: supplementiq
description: Transparency engine for supplement industry - crowdsourced data with bioavailability calculations

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.check-all: npm run check-all:backend && npm run check-all:frontend
scripts.fix-all: npm run fix-all:backend && npm run fix-all:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist
